reviews.review: Довольно интересная игра с интересной идеей. Порталы, которые позволят вам проходить уровень за уровем, сделаны отлично. Кажется, что если бы у вас была Портальная Пушка в реальной жизни, то всё было бы именно так. Не забудьте поиграть с другом в ко-опе, тоже довольно интересно. Только вот пусть ваш друг не будет тормозом, тут нежуно немного соображать, чтобы продвигатья.
The single player campaign is in every way better than it is in the first Portal, but the real deal here is the phenomenal co-op campaign!
Awesome Coop Game
To play this, I had  to use my head more than what I had used in my high school.
Love me some Portal  :)
game

This game failed to Portal me 2, another world. So, I believe it failed in its job.

7/10 an underwhelming amount of Water.

Toda una genialidad al igual que el primero. En esencia sigue siendo el mismo juego pero con gráficos, historia y diseño de niveles más cuidados. El doblaje es magistral, dando pleno sentido a los giros, las frases hechas, los sarcasmos y excentricidades de sus protagonistas.

Si jugaste al Portal original y te gustó, este te encantará y además te llevará el triple de tiempo terminarlo. Si disfrutas con este tipo de juegos de 'darle al coco' y no has jugado nunca a la saga Portal, no sabes lo que te estás perdiendo...!

For those who like puzzles with a touch of the z, x and y axis and then some! Portal 2 is a game that will satisfy your every need when it comes to flying, jumping, delivering hugs to friendly turrets, solving mind aweing puzzles and arguing with AI's in the middle of their electronic redemption.

Grab a friend, and then shove him into your own portals for an added fun factor.
one of my favourite games ever. the single player is insanely good. the co-op is ridiculously entertaining. 10/10 all around awesome

What can I say? Probably the best co-op experience I've ever had. This game really makes it so that both players have to participate together to get to the end of the level.  The levels are challenging, and introduce new concepts every few stages. Great game, would recommend it to anyone that wants to have some fun with a friend.

The story continues from Portal, with the introduction of a new character Wheatley providing some comic relief with his remarks and interactions with GlaDOS. Gameplay is largely the same as Portal, with the addition of a few new mechanics to keep things fresh. Co-op is even better than the story though, as you solve harder and more complex chambers with a partner, which I feel is more rewarding than playing solo.I especially liked the interactions between the two robots (you and your partner) and the mostly useless stats displayed in the chamber where you choose a co-op course.

A really great game by Valve and highly recommended to everyone.
Best puzzle game! Great co-op.

SPOILERS (kind of)
Sequel to Portal, the absolute surprise of Orange Box. Even though its puzzles are easier than the ones from the original Portal, developers have decided to add more types of puzzles in which you have to use Faith Plates, various gels which modify your motion, as well as hard light bridges and tractor beams. 
This time you are in cryosleep, when suddenly a small robot, Wheatley, wakes you up. With his help you try to escape Aperture Science labs, now completely owergrown and in ruins, at least until Wheatley accidentaly reactivates GLaDoS...
Again there is a lot of humour in this game. GLaDoS still sarcastically comments on - well almost every action you do, but we could say that Wheatley is a star of this game, with his at times paranoic and "Trust me, I'm an engineer" attitude and later his power-caused lunacy. 
Developers have had playing time in mind so you again go through loads of test chambers. Some of them are historical, and with audio records guidance of Aperture Science's CEO, Cave Johnson, you solve them as well, but you also learn a terrible secret. There is also a co-op campaign in which you and a friend of your choice control two robots, Atlas and P-Body, who are tested. And tested. And again.
 Since you can get Portal 2 with discount every now and then, I strongly advise you do so.
The almost-perfect blend of clever writing and engaging gameplay.

POR()         ()TAL2  es como Portal 1 pero con una historia que por fin se explica y unos graficazos, ahora os dejo con las criticas:

ING 11/10 : Mas insultos que en Portal 1
HobbitConsolas 10/10 : Cada minuto que juego me siento mas ofendido
Space Core SP/ACE : SPAAACEEEEEE
Los gemeliers 1/10 : Que no entendemos esta mierda de juego joder, que no habla sobre el amor verdadero, es hacer portales y mover cubos, puto sida, y la historia no se entiende, esta mal traducida o algo (o somos tontos, que seguro que no)

Portal es un juego indispensable que no puede faltar en tu biblioteca de Steam, es innovador, tiene plataformas y puzles, tiene humor sarcástico que te hará sentir mal en más de una ocasión xD la historia toma un giro radical, los mapas se van complicando y nunca son iguales, cuenta con secretos ocultos en los niveles, tiene modo cooperativo online, posibilidad de instalar mods y mapas y mucho más. Si quieres pasar un buen rato con un juego alucinante, ¿a qué esperas para jugar Portal 2? 
Nota: 10
